title: An ansvver to the deuillish detection of Stephane Gardiner, Bishoppe of Wynchester published to the intent that such as be desirous of the truth should not be seduced by hys errours, nor the blind [et] obstinate excused by ignorance Compiled by. A.G.
author: Gilby, Anthony, ca. 1510-1585.
publisher: Printed by S. Mierdman for John Day],
